    • Method Detail

      • getHolidays

        public java.util.Set<Holiday> getHolidays(int year,
                                          java.lang.String... args)
        Returns the holidays for the requested year and hierarchy structure. Calls Set with the configuration from initialization. Implements the rule which requests if two holidays have one non holiday between each other than this day is also a holiday.
        Overrides:
        getHolidays in class XMLManager
        Parameters:
        year - i.e. 2010
        args - i.e. args = {'ny'}. returns US/New York holidays. No args -> holidays common to whole country
        Returns:
        the list of holidays for the requested year
